SQL.LOAD: SELECT oc_template_params_id, oc_template_id, param_name, param_value_source_xcd, '' as param_value, 'STD' as param_type, param_data_type_xcd, date_format_string, allow_empty_value_xcd, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date FROM elp_oc_template_params WHERE oc_template_params_id = :oc_template_params_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST_BY_TEMPLATE_ID: SELECT oc_template_params_id, oc_template_id, param_name, param_value_source_xcd, elp_utl_lov.description(param_value_source_xcd, :language_id) param_value_source_description, '' as param_value, 'STD' as param_type, param_data_type_xcd, elp_utl_lov.description(param_data_type_xcd, :language_id) param_data_type_description, date_format_string, allow_empty_value_xcd, elp_utl_lov.description(allow_empty_value_xcd, :language_id) allow_empty_value_description, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date FROM elp_oc_template_params WHERE oc_template_id = :oc_template_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_oc_template_params SET oc_template_id = :oc_template_id, param_name = :param_name, param_value_source_xcd = :param_value_source_xcd, param_data_type_xcd = :param_data_type_xcd, date_format_string = :date_format_string, allow_empty_value_xcd = :allow_empty_value_xcd, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE oc_template_params_id = :oc_template_params_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_oc_template_params ( oc_template_id, param_name, param_value_source_xcd, param_data_type_xcd, date_format_string, allow_empty_value_xcd, created_by, oc_template_params_id ) VALUES ( :oc_template_id, :param_name, :param_value_source_xcd, :param_data_type_xcd, :date_format_string, :allow_empty_value_xcd, :created_by, :oc_template_params_id )
